Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Belmont
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted, and Clark due to, street blockage near Broadway/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Belmont, Halsted, and Clark due to, street blockage near Broadway/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Damen

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Western, Roscoe, Damen, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Damen.
